SELECT * FROM( SELECT MESSAGE.TEXT, USER.PICTURE AS USERPICTURE, REPLACE( REPLACE( CONCAT( MONTH( MESSAGE.TIME ) , '월 ', DAY( MESSAGE.TIME ) , '일 ', DATE_FORMAT( MESSAGE.TIME, '%p %h:%i' ) ) , 'AM', '오전' ) , 'PM', '오후' ) AS TIME, USER.NAME AS SENDER, MESSAGE.ID, MESSAGE.BACK, MESSAGE.USER AS USER, USER.ID AS SENDERID FROM MESSAGE LEFT OUTER JOIN USER ON MESSAGE.SENDER = USER.ID WHERE MESSAGE.USER = #id# ) X ORDER BY X.TIME DESC LIMIT #page#,#size#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE ( USER, SENDER, TEXT, BACK, PICTURE ) VALUES (#user#,#id#,#text#,#back#,#picture#)

INSERT INTO ALARM ( USER, TYPE, NAME1, PICTURE, GID ) SELECT FRIEND.USER, 'F', USER.NAME, USER.PICTURE, USER.ID FROM FRIEND LEFT OUTER JOIN USER ON FRIEND.FRIEND = USER.ID AND FRIEND.FRIEND = #friend#
sqlMap.select: SELECT USER.REGID FROM FRIEND LEFT OUTER JOIN USER ON FRIEND.USER = USER.ID AND FRIEND.FRIEND = #friend#
SELECT TEXT, REPLACE( REPLACE( CONCAT( MONTH( TIME ) , '월 ', DAY( TIME ) , '일 ', DATE_FORMAT( TIME, '%p %h:%i' ) ) , 'AM', '오전' ) , 'PM', '오후' ) AS TIME FROM NOTICE ORDER BY TIME DESC
